Based on the document you linked, I can answer your questions as follows:

1. Has the fund put in place internal policies or guidelines regarding ESG/SDG integration? If yes, provide details.

Yes, the fund has put in place internal policies and guidelines regarding ESG/SDG integration. The fund has a Responsible Investment Policy that outlines its approach to integrating ESG factors into its investment process. The policy includes guidelines for selecting and monitoring investments based on ESG criteria and for engaging with companies on ESG issues. The fund also has a Stewardship and Active Ownership Policy that outlines its approach to active ownership and engagement with companies.

1. Is any international ESG/SDG-related standard, taxonomy or benchmark employed in the investment decision-making process? If so, which ones?

Yes, the fund employs various international ESG/SDG-related standards, taxonomies, and benchmarks in its investment decision-making process. For example, the fund uses the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) as a framework for identifying and measuring the impact of its investments on sustainable development. The fund also uses various ESG data providers and research firms to assess companies' ESG performance and to identify investment opportunities. The fund may also use ESG indices or benchmarks to evaluate the performance of its investments relative to peers.

1. Does the fund provide clarity on efforts it has made to meet relevant national/regional/international ESG-related regulations? Which ones?

Yes, the fund provides clarity on efforts it has made to meet relevant national/regional/international ESG-related regulations. The fund states that it seeks to comply with all applicable laws and regulations related to ESG investing, including those at the national, regional, and international levels. The fund also engages with policymakers and regulators to promote sustainable finance and to advocate for policies that support responsible investing. The report provides examples of the fund's engagement on ESG issues with policymakers and regulators in various countries and regions.
